meanings.sent1: The toast was even jammier than yesterday.
meanings.sent2: Her hands were sticky from the jammier dough.
meanings.sent3: The jammier sandwich dripped with sweetness.
meanings.sent4: The jammier cake oozed with fruity goodness.
meanings.sent5: The jammier pastry was a delightful mess of flavors.

meanings.definition: Having the consistency or texture of jam.
meanings.sent1: The fabric felt jammier after washing.
meanings.sent2: The mud was thick and jammier underfoot.
meanings.sent3: The jammier pudding wobbled on the plate.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was a jammier mess of curls.
meanings.sent5: The jammier jelly clung to the spoon.
